title: Salmon with grapefruit and lentil salad
detail: Flatten the bread and mix up the filling and coating. Using a rolling pin, flatten the bread out.The cream cheese makes the bread a bit more filling, and tastes great mixed in with the garlic, paprika, and fresh parsley.
